option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - Display 'Posted just now' when comment was posted less than a minute ago. - Show the total number of comments in the comment thread page.

MESSAGE.value: Added User, Comment and CommentThread models, with scaffold
Added the ability to reply to a comment.
1. Finished the JQuery for the reply. 2. Added date formatters.
1. Added the comments_count column to comment_threads. 2. Fixed the sort comment threads by counts.
Date format in comment threads list.
- Display 'Posted just now' when comment was posted less than a minute ago. - Show the total number of comments in the comment thread page.
